title: 04/14/2021 - Hour 1 - Julian Edelman is Not a Hall of Famer
itunes:title: 04/14/2021 - Hour 1 - Julian Edelman is Not a Hall of Famer
description:
LaVar Arrington, TJ Houshmandzadeh and Plaxico Burress are filling in for Dan Patrick and the Danettes, weighing in on Julian Edelman's retirement and explaining why he shouldn't make it into Canton. Lead NFL Draft Analyst for ProFootballFocus, Mike Renner joins the guys to give his diamonds in the rough and to make the argument for the 49ers to draft Justin Fields. Plus, your calls making the case for Edelman as a Hall of Famer.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
